name: SUPERCHARGED
description:
SUPERCHARGED is an upcoming futuristic parkour FPS. Use a variety of slick movement options to navigate each action-packed level as quickly as possible. 

CURRENT FEATURES:

  • Explore futuristic environments using grappling hooks, wallrunning, and other flowy movement options
  • Satisfying robot-on-robot combat
  • Live the fantasy of escaping a high security sci-fi robot prison
  • Compete with your friends to get the fastest time in each level

PLANNED FEATURES (not yet in the game):

  • Boss fights
  • An open hub city
  • MANY more levels, including several unique mission types
  • Secrets
  • A proper story

SUPERCHARGED is still in development. This is an early alpha demo with many features missing or incomplete. Your continued support will help this game see its full release on Steam. Thank you!
